list_definition.definition: a statement by the maker that something will work for a certain period of time

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This guarantee is valid for one year.

list_definition.definition: a thing that makes something likely or certain

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It is no guarantee against failure.

list_definition.definition: to act as, or give, a guarantee

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This watch is guaranteed for six months.

list_definition.definition: to state that something is true, definite etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I can’t guarantee that what he told me is correct.
